column1: Tragedy Assistance Program for Survivors - Wikipedia
column3: DEF II was a programming strand on BBC Two
column4: which aired at 6pm on Mondays and Wednesdays from 9 May 1988 to 23 May 1994
column5: to serve the teenage market. It was produced by Janet Street-Porter
column6: and followed on from her influential youth TV show Network 7
column8: many of the presenters and staff on DEF II started their careers on Network 7 and had followed Street-Porter when she was "poached" by the BBC. It had an ident featuring a barcode which differed from the usual idents used on BBC Two.
